properties.name: app.search.retry-attempts
properties.description: Max retry attempts count for Google scraping.

properties.name: app.search.user-agent
properties.description: Default User-Agent header for the search.

properties.name: app.search.required-results-count
properties.description: Max results count to collect on Google Search page.

properties.name: app.proxy.operia.key
properties.description: Token for the Operia proxy service.

properties.name: app.scheduling.search.not.searched.data
properties.description: Cron for starting search for not searched initial data.

properties.name: app.scheduling.enabled
properties.description: Enable scheduling search for not searched initial data.

properties.name: app.search.tasks-timeout
properties.description: Time in minutes allotted for amount of tasks defined in 'concurrency-restriction' property to complete.
